overview: The film presents Jehovah's Witness beliefs about God's plan from the creation of the Earth through to the end of the 1,000 year reign of Christ. This presentation combined motion pictures and a slideshow, synchronized with sound (the first time such synchronization had been achieved). Over 9,000,000 people in North America, Europe, New Zealand and Australia saw the film.

production_companies.name: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

tagline: Harmonizes Science, History and the Bible
title: The Photo-Drama of Creation
